txt.en: 'You have done much for the Gondorian army. Victory will surely be ours!'
Melethon is at the Causeway Forts.\n\nYou should speak to Melethon.
The Belegiant Bridge is located in centre of Osgiliath over the Anduin River.\n\nYou should defend the centre of the Belegiant Bridge.
Melethon has tasked you with defending the Belegiant Bridge from enemy who is trying to retake it.
Do not leave the centre of the bridge
Defend the centre of the Belegiant Bridge
You have left the bridge unguarded
The Belegiant Bridge is located in the centre of Osgiliath over the Anduin River.\n\nYou should keep your post and defend the centre of the Belegiant Bridge.
Keep your post and defend the centre of the bridge
You have successfully defended the Belegiant Bridge
'The enemy is trying to capture the Belegiant Bridge! You must defend the centre of the bridge with your life.\n\n'We cannot afford to lose this key defensive point in Osgiliath! For Gondor!'
